meta.description: Determine the optimal number of densely-seated and loosely-seated ski lifts to install to minimize the total number of ski lifts while meeting guest transport and electricity constraints.

sets.name: LIFT_TYPES
sets.description: Types of ski lifts available for installation.

params.name: guest_capacity
params.description: Number of guests each type of ski lift can transport per minute.

params.name: electricity_usage
params.description: Electricity usage of each type of ski lift.

vars.name: num_lifts
vars.description: Number of ski lifts to install of each type.

objective.name: min_total_lifts
objective.description: Minimize the total number of ski lifts installed.

constraints.name: min_loose_lifts
constraints.description: At least five loosely-seated ski lifts must be installed.

constraints.name: min_guest_transport
constraints.description: The ski lifts must transport at least 1000 guests per minute.

constraints.name: max_electricity_usage
constraints.description: The total electricity usage of the ski lifts must not exceed 940 units.
